text: Iwe Muporofita (Muhammad (SAW))! Kurudzira vatendi kuti varwise (vavengi). Kana paine vanhu makumi maviri vakashinga pakati penyu, vachakurira mazana maviri, uye kana paine zana revanhu vakashinga pakati penyu, vachakurira churu cheavo vasingatendi, nokuti vari (vasingatendi) vanhu vasinganzwisisi
